title.narrative: 2018 Management Project - Africa SME Finance Forum

description.narrative: The project will enable key stakeholders, partner organizations and the Foundation to convene for the Africa Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) Finance Forum 2018. The Africa SME Finance Forum will examine key challenges faced by SMEs in Africa, as well as innovative solutions that promote youth entrepreneurship and enhance access to financing and training. The aim is to use the Forum as a means to share learnings that can benefit the SME ecosystem in Africa. The project will also support special tracks, including on the topic of youth entrepreneurship, as well as the participation of individuals who would not otherwise be able to attend. These areas relate back to the Foundation’s strategic priority of youth employment, and more specifically, on scaling access to finance
